name: Fire Wood
description:
The Forest has been attacked by an "Evil Fire Demon" . All Plants and Animals are attacked, except for a "Small Bush" ...,

Features:

- Retro Style
- Pixel Graphics
- Chiptune Sound
- Unique Gameplay

Movement:

Left Arrow = Left
Right Arrow = Right
Y/Z = Jump
X = Shot

This is a Prototype ..., tell me what you think of it!!!
